layout.name: distance
layout.title: Distance
layout.tooltip: How far the block shoots npcs.

layout.name: waitTime
layout.title: Wait Time
layout.tooltip: The time (in ticks) the block waits before shooting.

layout.name: shootsFirst
layout.title: Shoots First
layout.tooltip: If true, this block will shoot before its partner block.

layout.name: count
layout.title: Shoot Count
layout.tooltip: The amount of npcs shot by the block.
